Key Match Events: Mahmoud Al-Aswad scored the opening goal in the 7th minute
Daleho Irandust scored the second goal in the 76th minute
Pablo Sabbag scored the third goal in the 90+6th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Manolo Márquez was angry with the first half performance and satisfied with the second half
José Lana was happy with Syria's performance in the tournament with a young squad
Miscellaneous Highlights: Syria were crowned the Intercontinental Cup 2024 champions
Mahmoud Al-Mawas was named the Syed Abdul Rahim Player of the Tournament
Others: India made seven changes in their lineup from the previous match
José Lana rotated all 11 players from Syria's previous match
